boardgame.name: Dreamblade
boardgame.description: From the publishers website:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;In the near future, specially trained psychics called dream lords venture deep into the dreamscape. Here they explore a shifting landscape of ancient archetypes, modern terrors, and mismatched elements of the waking world. This is the shared unconsciousness of humanity, the boundless well of hopes and fears that makes us human. The reality they create in this timeless realm reverberates through the minds of dreamers everywhere. Some dream lords seek to protect it, others to dominate it, and others to destroy it._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The Dreamblade collectible miniatures game allows you to project your mind into the dreamscape and wage war against an endless sea of rivals. Draw upon psychic energies to create formidable creatures that you control in battle. Confront your opponents, destroy their creations and drive them from the dreamscape!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Current status : The game has been discontinued as of October 2007, no more new sets will be produced._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Released Sets:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Base Set - 96 miniatures_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Baxar's War - 60 miniatures_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Chrysotic Plague - 60 miniatures_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Anvilborn - 60 miniatures_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Night Fusion - 60 miniatures_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgamehonor: 2007 Golden Geek Best 2-Player Board Game Nominee
boardgame.boardgamepodcastepisode: MeepleCore Podcast Episode 22 - Game Informers Top 2016 board games, Final Fantasy 15 Review, funniest ways to select start player, and more!

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

listing.notes: New Starter Set. It has been opened but other than that, it_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s in pecfect condition. In addition I am throwing in 1 special edition Promo Figure of a Knight of Autumn Gate (marked P5) on the bottom.
Case of base set boosters, unopened. Order more, save on shipping! Shipped for $10 in the US. Ask for international shipping prices. Thanks so much for looking.
Case of base set boosters, unopened. Order more, save on shipping! Shipped for $10 in the US. Ask for international shipping prices. Thanks so much for looking.
Unopened Starter Set, $3 shipping. Five available. If you buy all five, get $12 shipping, and 2 unopened Booster Packs free.

Two (2) starter sets plus a fistful of promo figures from GenCon 06. Smoke free environment. Shipping cost depends on your choice of carrier and rate. Please purchase only if you are willing to pay through PayPal.

One opened starter. Rare: Ego Cannibal Uncommon: Barbstrider Relentless Eviscerator Common: Bladehound Blind Spikemauler Boneblade Serpent Dreamstuff Entity Eagle-Feather Warrior Hellshrieker Hive Pincer Jack of Blades Knight of Autumn Gate Knight of Pain and Sorrow Pick-Pick Spellbound Scissors Twilight Scout

$18 for a complete set of 52 common miniatures, mostly unopened and all in excellent condition. Or $14 for a set of 51 different common miniatures, all but Zungar Blademaster. $6.75 shipping in US. I combine shipping, so please look at my other sale listings. Karl Hanf
one Unwishing Well sealed Dreamblade figure
Only opened the box; Dreamblade starter set, all figures still in shrink.
Unopened case of base set. (12 boosters)

I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m looking to get rid of all my surpluse Dreamblade game materials. This set would work best for someone looking to expand on a very modest collection (say one starter box). This lot would not work for someone starting without the board and rules (although I might be able to get a map and rules if someone does want this game material so as to try and get started in the game. This lot includes close to 200 figures, primarily commons, from the first two sets: 2 unopened Dreamblade base set boosters 1 near complete set of base set commons (N=31) Another near complete set of base set commons (N=30) 3 complete sets of Baxar_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s commons, (20 commons make a complete set, so 60 total minis here) 2 partially complete sets of Baxar_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s common (N=16; N=14) About 6 or so random Baxar commons and 20 random base set commons. Shipping is $11 to Eastern and Central time zone and $13 to Pacific and Mountain. Shipping is a bit high as this is a bulky lot (one of the game_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s downfalls I suspect)

This collection is made up of figures from base set, Chrysotic Plague and Baxar_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s War starters/boosters/promos. There are about 150 figures, including 15 rares/promos. -All-seeing Mage Promo -Octorilla -Greenlife Dryad -Fleshless Reaper -Hive Pincer Promo -World Eater -Whirlwind Dervish -Tlamitec Battlelord And more... Also included are the playmats, rules, lists, dice, etc. that come with said starters.
This is a box of 12 Anvilborn boosters.
complete set of Baxar_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s war for user filadin keep on being you.

I have a massive collection of these figures I received in a trade. I dont know a whole lot about them as I have not had a chance to sift through them other than to sort by faction. From the info I received in the trade there is the contents of a booster box of many of the sets. I can provide some pics to provide sense of how many minis are there and what might be included. I can check for specifics but cant get a real detailed list. I would move this as a lot and am open to offers. This would be quite heavy as well so shipping but again I would work something out that is fair to both of us! Send me a message if interested!
Over 90 Minis + Dice and a playmat/board. Some doubles

Good sized collection of Dreamblade figures. A friend of mine and I went together and bought the remaining stock from a store after the game was discontinued; this is half of that set. It will serve as a good starting point for new players and may serve well to enhance an existing collection also. Picture depicts miniatures to be included in this sale. Also, includes two game-maps, dice and a rulebook. Domestic shipping is $15 via FedEx Ground. Please contact me for an international shipping quote. Thanks for looking and be sure to check out my other games for sale. NOTE: I will take reasonable precautions in securely packing these miniatures for shipment, however I will not be responsible for any broken miniatures upon delivery.

540 total miniatures from the first 4 sets. 2 maps 2 base rule books 16 Dreamblade dice in 2 different colors 2 initiative dice A quick breakdown of the miniatures: Base Set 32/32 Common 13/32 Uncommon 1/32 Rare Baxar_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s War 20/20 Common 13/20 Uncommon 2/20 Rare Chrysotic Plague 20/20 Common 6/20 Uncommon 3/20 Rare Anvilborn 18/20 Common 13/20 Uncommon 0/20 Rare ----------------------------------- 540 Total Miniatures Base Set 262 Common 21 Uncommon 1 Rare Baxar_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s War 127 Common 18 Uncommon 3 Rare Chrysotic Plague 48 Common 6 Uncommon 3 Rare Anvilborn 37 Common 14 Uncommon 0 Rare This is about 25 lbs worth so expect shipping to be fairly high. If you want a complete list of miniatures, drop me a geekmail and I can send you an Excel file.
Reserved for R. Schuyler Devin (rsdevin)

$18 for a complete set of 52 common miniatures, brand new, all but 2 bagged. SHIPPING: USA: $8.75 shipping in USA. MULTIPLE ITEMS: I combine shipping! So look at my other games for sale. If you_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;re interested in any of my other games for sale, the additional shipping cost would only be about $3 per large game, or ~$1 per small/card game. MASSACHUSETTS: Local buyers may pick up orders of $25 or more in person, in Billerica or Cambridge. INTERNATIONAL: Please ask about international shipping costs before ordering. The shipping to most countries, for a normal-size game, is at least $40! INSURANCE: You may add $1.35 for optional insurance. (Otherwise, I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll just get Delivery Confirmation, but in the unlikely event that USPS lost or damaged the package, it would unfortunately be your loss.) PAYMENT: You may pay by PayPal.com (credit cards accepted) to karlhanf@comcast.net ; or by Google Checkout if you give me your email; or if you_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;re patient, by mailing a check to me. Thank you! I await your payment or questions. Karl Hanf
Full set of each Dreamblade set. Every miniature ever made. Base Baxar_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s War Chrysotic Plague Anvilborn Nightfusion

In this auction you will get all 32 commons from the Dreamblade base set. That_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s 8 of each Aspect (Valor, Fear, Madness, Passion) and enough to make two 16-fig warbands. Every fig is still in the bag, straight from the boosters. Brand new figures, still in their little bags. Just figures, not boxes or rules. From smoke-free home. Most of the figures are commons. $25 for a set of 53 unique figures, or $22 for a set of 51 unique figures, or $19 for 48 unique, or $15 for 39 unique, or $12 for 34 unique (1 of them unbagged), or $9 for 28 unique (1 of them unbagged). Or $60 for all 253 miniatures! (6 copies each of 28 characters, 5 copies each of 34-28=6 characters, 4 copies each of 39-34=5 characters, 3 copies each of 48-39=9 characters, 2 copies each of 51-48=3 characters, and 1 copy each of 53-51=2 characters.) Shipping $7 regardless of size of lot(s). SHIPPING: USA: $7 shipping in USA. MULTIPLE ITEMS: I combine shipping! So look at my other games for sale.
